parkingRobot.hsamr0

Class HmiPLT

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkingRobot.hsamr0.HmiPLT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INxtHmi

    public class HmiPLT
extends Object
implements INxtHmi
    HMI server module which collects all relevant robot data and sends them to any connected client. Connection has to be p2p, so there is only one remote client per robot permitted.
    Author:
    PLT

    • Constructor Detail

      • HmiPLT

        public HmiPLT(IPerception perception,
      INavigation navigation,
      IControl control)
        Creates a new HmiPlt module. It accesses position and parking slot information from provided modules for navigation, perception and control.
        Parameters:
        perception - reference to instantiated perception module
        navigation - reference to instantiated navigation module
        control - reference to instantiated control module

        public INxtHmi.Mode getMode()
        Description copied from interface: INxtHmi
        Returns the current driving mode, which is a value of Mode. The driving mode is set via user request from a remote device.

        the current driving mode

      • getSelectedParkingSlot

        public int getSelectedParkingSlot()
        Description copied from interface: INxtHmi
        Retrieves the currently selected parking slot to be used by the other robot modules. The parking slot is set via user request from a remote device.
        Specified by:
        getSelectedParkingSlot in interface INxtHmi
        Returns:
